alert.note: Alert for Baker; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Mitchell and northeastern Baker Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton, Pelham, Camilla, Baconton, Sale City, Flint, Red Store Crossroads, Cotton, Laney, Freeman, Mitchell Co A/P, Greenough and Hinsonton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
